stanza.line: Those lips that Love own hand did makemake

Chiding that tongue that ever sweetsweet

And taught it thus anew to greetgreet
I hate she altered with an endend
That followed it as gentle dayday
Doth follow night who like a fiendfiend
From heaven to hell is flown awayaway
